fields.name: dest
fields.comment: The target in the certificate management event.

fields.name: dest_port
fields.comment: The port number of the target.

fields.name: dest_priority
fields.comment: The priority of the target.

fields.name: duration
fields.comment: The amount of time for the completion of the certificate management event, in seconds.

fields.name: response_time
fields.comment: The amount of time it took to receive a response in the certificate management event, if applicable.

fields.name: src
fields.comment: The source involved in the certificate management event. You can alias this from more specific fields, such as src_host, src_ip, or src_nt_host.

fields.name: src_port
fields.comment: The port number of the source.

fields.name: src_priority
fields.comment: The priority of the certificate management source.

fields.name: transport
fields.comment: The transport protocol of the Network Traffic involved with this certificate.

fields.name: ssl_end_time
fields.comment: The expiry time of the certificate. Needs to be converted to UNIX time for calculations in dashboards.

fields.name: ssl_engine
fields.comment: The name of the signature engine that created the certificate.

fields.name: ssl_hash
fields.comment: The hash of the certificate.

fields.name: ssl_is_valid
fields.comment: Indicator of whether the ssl certificate is valid or not.

fields.name: ssl_issuer
fields.comment: The certificate issuer's RFC2253 Distinguished Name.

fields.name: ssl_issuer_common_name
fields.comment: The certificate issuer's common name.

fields.name: ssl_issuer_email
fields.comment: The certificate issuer's email address.

fields.name: ssl_issuer_locality
fields.comment: The certificate issuer's locality.

fields.name: ssl_issuer_organization
fields.comment: The certificate issuer's organization.

fields.name: ssl_issuer_street
fields.comment: The certificate issuer's street address.

fields.name: ssl_issuer_unit
fields.comment: The certificate issuer's organizational unit.

fields.name: ssl_name
fields.comment: The name of the ssl certificate.

fields.name: ssl_policies
fields.comment: The Object Identification Numbers's of the certificate's policies in a comma separated string.

fields.name: ssl_publickey
fields.comment: The certificate's public key.

fields.name: ssl_publickey_algorithm
fields.comment: The algorithm used to create the public key.

fields.name: ssl_serial
fields.comment: The certificate's serial number.

fields.name: ssl_session_id
fields.comment: The session identifier for this certificate.

fields.name: ssl_signature_algorithm
fields.comment: The algorithm used by the Certificate Authority to sign the certificate.

fields.name: ssl_start_time
fields.comment: This is the start date and time for this certificate's validity. Needs to be converted to UNIX time for calculations in dashboards.

fields.name: ssl_subject
fields.comment: The certificate owner's RFC2253 Distinguished Name.

fields.name: ssl_subject_common_name
fields.comment: This certificate owner's common name.

fields.name: ssl_subject_email
fields.comment: The certificate owner's e-mail address.

fields.name: ssl_subject_locality
fields.comment: The certificate owner's locality.

fields.name: ssl_subject_organization
fields.comment: The certificate owner's organization.

fields.name: ssl_subject_state
fields.comment: The certificate owner's state of residence.

fields.name: ssl_subject_street
fields.comment: The certificate owner's street address.

fields.name: ssl_subject_unit
fields.comment: The certificate owner's organizational unit.

fields.name: ssl_validity_window
fields.comment: The length of time (in seconds) for which this certificate is valid.

fields.name: ssl_version
fields.comment: The ssl version of this certificate.
